    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1879158214</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Knowledge in Action, Build Stuff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissen in der Tätigkeit, Bau-Material</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La connaissance dans l'action, substance de 
construction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecimento na ação, material da 
configuração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscenza nell'azione, Roba di 
configurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γνώση στην ενέργεια, χτίζει την ουσία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conocimiento en la acción, materia de la 
estructura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Selection of MIT OpenCourseWare content intended to stretch your creativity by learning how to build new things.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl MIT OpenCourseWare des Inhalts 
beabsichtigte, Ihre Kreativität auszudehnen, indem sie erlernte, wie 
man neue Sachen aufbaut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La sélection du contenu de MIT OpenCourseWare a 
destiné pour étirer votre créativité en apprenant comment établir
de nouvelles choses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A seleção do índice do MIT OpenCourseWare 
pretendeu esticar sua creatividade aprendendo como construir coisas 
novas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La selezione del soddisfare del MIT OpenCourseWare
ha inteso allungare la vostra creatività imparando come sviluppare le
nuove cose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή ικανοποιημένου προοριζόμενου MIT 
OpenCourseWare να τεντώσει τη δημιουργικότητά σας με την 
εκμάθηση πώς να χτίσει τα νέα πράγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La selección del contenido del MIT OpenCourseWare
se prepuso estirar su creatividad aprendiendo cómo construir nuevas 
cosas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
